Name: State Bank of New South Wales

About.Hours & facilities: Collection closed. Mail enquiries should be addressed to the CBA Archivist.

About.Access: Access is restricted. Requests for information should be directed to the CBA Archivist.

About.Acquisition focus: The collection is now closed. The Acquisition forcus of the Collection was to record the Bank's administrative history. The collection was 100% in-house.

About.Major holdings:
Government Savings Bank of New South Wales: Board minutes 1909-1920 (1.3m).
	Oral history collection.

Contact.Note: Collection is closed. The State Bank was taken over in the late 1990's by the Colonial group who in turn have been taken over by the Commonwealth Bank, hence, the State Bank Collection is now part of the Commonwealth Bank's collection.
